_source.name: Hack Tech Trek
_source.desc:
Hack Tech Trek firmly believe that the synergy of diverse minds and an inclusive atmosphere is the driving force behind creativity and progress. 

Our commitment is to provide an open and supportive environment for all attendees, regardless of their skill level or background. 

Whether you're an experienced developer or just starting your journey, whether you have a technical background or not, there's a place for you at Hack Tech Trek Hackathon.

hackathon_faqs.question: Can I participate as an individual or do I need to form a team?
hackathon_faqs.answer: You can participate individually as well as you can make a team of maximum 4 members

hackathon_faqs.question: What are the categories or themes of the hackathon challenges?
hackathon_faqs.answer:
1. Open theme
2. Web3/Blockchain development
3. Web development
4. Android development
5. AI and ML development

hackathon_faqs.question: Can I participate if I'm a beginner or have limited coding experience?
hackathon_faqs.answer:
Absolutely! **Hack Hurricane** is designed to be inclusive and welcomes participants of *all skill levels*. Whether you're a seasoned coder or just starting your coding journey, this hackathon is a fantastic opportunity to learn, collaborate, and showcase your creativity.

To support participants with limited coding experience:

**Learning Resources**: We'll provide learning resources and tutorials to help beginners get started and build their skills during the hackathon.

**Mentorship**: Experienced mentors will be available throughout the event to offer guidance, answer questions, and provide assistance to participants at every level.

**Team Collaboration**: Consider forming or joining a team with a mix of skills. Collaborating with others can be a great way to learn and contribute to a diverse project.

hackathon_faqs.question: Any advice for newbie at Hackathon?
hackathon_faqs.answer: Remember, the hackathon is not just about the final product; it's about the experience, learning, and the journey. So, dive in, explore, and enjoy the hacking adventure at Hack Hurricane!

hackathon_faqs.question: How do I join a team or invite others to join mine?
hackathon_faqs.answer: Visit our discord server to connect with other participants or invite team members. You can create or join a team, view participant profiles, and send or accept team invitations.

hackathon_faqs.question: How will the projects be judged?
hackathon_faqs.answer:
Projects will be evaluated based on creativity, technical complexity, impact, and presentation.
Our expert panel of judges will consider innovation, effective use of technology, and the overall quality of the solution

hackathon_faqs.question: What are the eligibility criteria?
hackathon_faqs.answer: **Hack Hurricane** is open to participants of all backgrounds, skill levels, and ages. There are **no** specific eligibility criteria.

hackathon_faqs.question: What is the mode of Hackathon?
hackathon_faqs.answer: Online

prizes.name: Best hack built on Ethereum + Polygon

_source.name: Hack Hurricane 1.0
_source.desc:
Welcome to **"Hack Hurricane"** an amazing hackathon experience brought to you by the former co-organizers of the widely acclaimed **"Soft CodeHack"**. As seasoned organizers in the field of coding and innovation, we are thrilled to present this opportunity for you to present your creativity, fight real-world challenges, and showcase your coding skills.

Key Features:

**Solo or Team Participation:** Choose your path – embark on the coding journey alone or assemble a team of like-minded individuals. The choice is yours.

**Innovate, Create, Win:** Hack Hurricane is not just a competition; it's an opportunity to turn your ideas into reality. From solving real-world problems to developing cutting-edge applications, this is your chance to make a lasting impact.

**Exciting Prizes:** The thrill doesn’t stop with the coding challenges. Winners will not only gain recognition for their outstanding work but will also take home exciting prizes that acknowledge their dedication and ingenuity.

How to Participate:

**Register:** Head over to our website and register for Hack Hurricane. It’s your first step toward a coding adventure like no other.

**Form Your Team** (*Optional*): If you prefer the mutual trust of teamwork, assemble a group of up to 4 talented individuals. Teamwork makes the dream work!

**Coding Begins:** Once registered, you'll receive access to the challenge categories. Pick your challenge, start coding, and let the hurricane of innovation sweep you away.

**Submit Your Project:** Don't forget to submit your project before the deadline. Our panel of experienced judges can't wait to see what you've created.

**Celebrate and Learn:** Join us for the closing ceremony where winners will be announced, and participants will have the chance to connect with industry experts and fellow coders.

Get ready for a coding storm like never before. **Hack Hurricane** is not just an event; it's a journey where your ideas can transform into impactful solutions. Let the coding winds guide you, and may the best innovations prevail!

For further queries:

Join our Discord https://discord.gg/fwV2pfJN

Contact Us:
Nitish (6203989072)
Ajeet (ajeet.20224010@mnnit.ac.in)

hackathon_faqs.question: Who can participate?
hackathon_faqs.answer: DeFy24 welcomes college students from all fields of study and backgrounds. Whether deeply passionate about Web3 technology or aspiring entrepreneurs, this hackathon encourages diverse perspectives and expertise.

hackathon_faqs.question: What's the team size allowed? Can I participate alone?
hackathon_faqs.answer: **Teams of 4-6 members** are permitted to participate, fostering a collaborative environment. Unfortunately, **solo participation is not allowed** to ensure a synergistic exchange of ideas and skills among participants.

hackathon_faqs.question: When do applications and submissions close?
hackathon_faqs.answer:
Both application submissions and project submissions will close on **December 25th, 2023** It's important to ensure all necessary materials are submitted before this deadline.

You need to submit the link at the time of application, but you can edit/complete the proposal anytime before the deadline.

hackathon_faqs.question: Can I participate without deep technical knowledge in Blockchain or Web3?
hackathon_faqs.answer: **Absolutely!!** DeFy24 emphasizes collaboration between individuals with technical prowess and those with business acumen. Participants are encouraged to form teams that encompass both skill sets, fostering a well-rounded approach to problem-solving.

hackathon_faqs.question: Is it mandatory to focus on both the business and Web3 aspects?
hackathon_faqs.answer: **Yes** participants are expected to showcase not only *technical proficiency* in their prototypes but also a keen understanding of the market dynamics and the *potential business applications* of their ideas. This comprehensive approach is integral to the evaluation process.

hackathon_faqs.question: What is the prize pool?
hackathon_faqs.answer: The prize pool for DeFy24 is noteworthy, amounting to **₹1 lakh+**. Winners will not only receive cash rewards but also **Tokens, Credits, and exciting goodies** as a testament to their achievements.

hackathon_faqs.question: What are the Registration Charges?
hackathon_faqs.answer:
Registration for the **initial ideation round** is **completely free** for all participants. 
However, for the subsequent **offline 3-day hackathon event**, there will be a **minimal admission fee**.

hackathon_faqs.question: Do you provide travel reimbursements for the finalists?
hackathon_faqs.answer: While DeFy24 is free of charge for participants, including thanks to our generous sponsors and partners, unfortunately, the **event cannot cover expenses related to travel or any other incidental costs** incurred by attendees.

prizes.name: Best hack built on Ethereum + Polygon
DeFy Disruptor Grant
prizes.desc: The **DeFi Disruptor Grant** celebrates trailblazing projects within the **Public Goods Track**, emphasizing solutions that **elevate community welfare** and sustainable practices. This grant recognizes pioneering initiatives that **promote transparency, authenticity, and ethical standards in creating impactful public goods.** Winners showcase innovation in redefining traditional models, contributing significantly to the betterment of society through forward-thinking approaches.

prizes.name: ZKWallet Innovation Grant
prizes.desc: The **ZKWallet Innovation Grant** aims to reward pioneering solutions within the **Account Abstraction Track**. This grant is dedicated to encouraging inventive approaches in creating **user-friendly and secure account management solutions for decentralized applications.** Winners will be recognized for their innovative utilization of zero-knowledge proofs within wallet technology, enhancing privacy and security in decentralized ecosystems.

prizes.name: ZKWallet Innovation Grant
prizes.desc: The **ZKWallet Innovation Grant** for the DeFi Track celebrates inventive solutions in the realm of decentralized finance. This grant recognizes pioneering projects that **leverage zkWallet technology** to **revolutionize lending, trading, and other financial services within decentralized ecosystems**. Winners will be acknowledged for their innovative integration of zero-knowledge proofs, enhancing privacy, security, and efficiency in DeFi platforms.

_source.name: DeFy24
_source.location: Vellore Institute of Technology Chennai Campus (VIT Chennai), Kelambakkam - Vandalur Road, Rajan Nagar, Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India
_source.desc:
# DeFy24: A 36-Hour Hackathon for the Future

Calling all web3 enthusiasts and aspiring entrepreneurs! DeFy24 is a 36-hour hackathon that will challenge you to think outside the box and create innovative web3 startups. Unlike traditional hackathons, DeFy24 isn't just about coding; it's about disrupting the status quo and reimagining the future. Join us and help us create a world where decentralization and future yield go hand in hand.

**Round 1 : Ideation Round**

The online ideation round provides an ideal platform to unleash your creativity and present innovative ideas. Participants are encouraged to thoroughly review the provided document to grasp the expectations and guidelines for crafting a successful submission.

**The [Product Proposal Link](https://scratch-slash-7b5.notion.site/Submission-for-Ideation-Round-d2ae16cb2df94e408945fd3096f5bb90) must be submitted during the registration. You can edit the Notion link anytime before the deadline i.e 25th Dec, 2023.**

The participating teams will be evaluated on both their technical and business acumen. The top 30 teams from the three main tracks will advance to the second round based on the mentioned selection criteria.

**Round 2: In-House Hackathon and Business Pitch Competition**

Get ready for the next stage of DeFy24, the in-house hackathon! The top 30 teams from Round 1 will be invited to participate in this exciting event, where they will have the opportunity to further develop their ideas, learn and compete for a share of the ₹1L prize pool. 

Two top teams from each track will be selected based on the judgment criteria to advance to the business pitch competition.

**Business Pitch Competition:** Present your innovative business pitch to a panel of judges and compete for the top prize.

Don't miss this incredible opportunity to take your DeFy24 journey to the next level! Join us for the hackathon, learn from experts, and showcase your entrepreneurial spirit.

Together, let's defy the status quo and shape the future of Web3 and Business!

_source.name: Datathon 2024
_source.location: K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering, Vidyanagar, Vidya Vihar East, Vidyavihar, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India
_source.desc: Datathon is a platform that transcends geographical boundaries, fostering innovation and collaboration among India's brightest young minds. The event promises to be an intellectual playground where participants, with a passion for data science, converge to compete in a series of challenging tracks. These tracks encompass a wide spectrum of data science domains, including Natural Language Processing (NLP), Generative AI, MLOps, and more. It's here that the next generation of data scientists will demonstrate their expertise, learn from seasoned professionals, and network with peers who share their zeal for data-driven solutions.

_source.name: DevStorm
_source.tagline: Storm your way through DevFest 3.0's Signature Hackathon!
_source.desc: *DevFest, the annual flagship event of the Developers' Society at BITS Goa,  is not merely an event; it is a transformative and immersive experience designed to celebrate technology, innovation, and collaborative coding culture. In its third edition, DevFest 3.0 brings its very own hackathon, DevStorm. This year holds special significance as we mark the 10th anniversary of DevSoc and the 20th anniversary of BITS Pilani Goa. With each edition, DevFest continues to elevate standards, bringing together over 3000 students from across the country, both physically at BITS Pilani Goa campus and virtually.*

hackathon_faqs.question: What is the criteria for shortlisting teams?
hackathon_faqs.answer: The registered participants will be shortlisted on the basis of their **Problem Statement, Resume, LinkedIn/Github profiles etc.**

hackathon_faqs.question: I am a beginner, Can I register?
hackathon_faqs.answer: YES!! Of course, You can. We, at ACE, support beginner friendly teams and are even reserving a few spots for enthusiastic participants! If you're one of them, you're more than welcome!

hackathon_faqs.question: What do I bring with me to the event?
hackathon_faqs.answer: You are required to bring your School/College ID, laptops, phone, chargers. A pillow and sleeping bag may be useful as well and any equipment related to your projects.

hackathon_faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria?
hackathon_faqs.answer: This is open to all students. We would love to have your participation. **You must be a student from any University/College or Higher Secondary School.**

hackathon_faqs.question: What benefits do I get from this hackathon?
hackathon_faqs.answer: **Experience, Prizes, Lots of Goodies, Participation Certificate, Networking with Mentors and Industrial Experts, Coffee, and a whole lot of memories.**
